Detailed Description

MonitorCache, holds a cache of CacheElements.

Is multithread safe, atleast for ISABThreads.

Definition at line 29 of file MonitorCache.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

MonitorCache::MonitorCache (  CacheElement::CACHE_TYPE  type,
uint32  maxCacheSize = 1048576,
uint32  maxElements = 1000
) 
 

Parameters:
maxCacheSize is the maximum size of the cache in chars(bytes).
maxElements is the maximum number of elements in the cache.
startSize is the initial number of possible entries in the cache.
incrementSize is the size of with the cache grows.

CacheElement* MonitorCache::find (  CacheElement *  keyElement  ) 
 

Finds a match.

Updates the last used time and adds a lock to the element.

Parameters:
keyElement the CacheElement to use == on to find the match.
Returns:
the first CacheElement in the cache with the same key as keyElement

uint32 MonitorCache::getCurrentRemovedSize (  uint32 *  nbr = NULL  )  const
 

Get the current size and elementcount for removed but not yet released elements.

Note that this calculates the sizes each call! Use with care.
